item.title: Waymo has two new CEOs, one of whom is a woman of color
item.description: John Krafcik is handing over the job to executives Tekedra Mawakana and Dmitri Dolgov.

item.title: Google will reportedly use its own chip in the Pixel 6
item.description: According to documentation 9to5Google says it saw, the chipset, codenamed Whitechapel, will power Pixels that are slated to launch this fall.

item.title: Summer Game Fest's second edition gets underway in June
item.description: A Day of the Devs showcase of indie and AAA games is on the schedule.

item.title: MIT researchers use radio waves to help robots find hidden objects
item.description: With a wrist-mounted camera and an RF reader, RF Grasp can find and pick up objects, even if they're initially hidden from sight.

item.title: This week's best deals: $50 off Apple's MacBook Air M1 and more
item.description: Here's a list of the best tech deals from this week that you can still get today, including $50 off Apple's MacBook Air M1 and $40 off Amazon's Echo Show 10.

item.title: Apple's Magic Keyboards for iPad are cheaper than ever on Amazon
item.description: Save big on Apple's Magic Keyboard for iPad -- both the 11-inch and 12.9-inch models are at record low prices.

item.title: Samsung drops the price of the Galaxy Z Fold2 5G by $200
item.description: The foldable can be all yours for $1,800.

item.title: Official Xbox Series X mini fridges are coming
item.description: Microsoft is honoring a promise to make Xbox Series X mini fridges after winning a Twitter battle.

item.title: 'Final Fantasy' creator Sakaguchi on what makes 'Fantasian' a unique mobile RPG
item.description: Hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of Final Fantasy, chats about his new Apple Arcade RPG Fantasian.

item.title: Upgrade your living room with this home theater system that’s under $300
item.description: The Onkyo OHTS3900 5.1-Channel Home Theater System is an immersive surround sound setup that delivers bold and crisp sound and Bluetooth compatibility with an easy setup.

item.title: 'MLB The Show 21' is coming to Xbox Game Pass at launch
item.description: Subscribers can play a PlayStation Studios game at no extra cost. Strange times.

item.title: Rivian's EV service plans include remote diagnosis and on-site repairs
item.description: Rivian has outlined how it will service your EV, including remote diagnosis and on-site visits — it's hoping to beat Tesla at its own game.

item.title: Samsung's SmartTag+ Bluetooth tracker is finally available for pre-order
item.description: More than two months after it was announced, Samsung's SmartTag+ Bluetooth item tracker is finally available to pre-order ahead of an April 12th release date.

item.title: Apple Arcade adds over 30 games and a 'greatest hits' section
item.description: Apple Arcade has expanded to 180-plus games, including a mix of App Store classics like 'Monument Valley' and 'Fruit Ninja.'

item.title: What if your next electric car's body was also its battery?
item.description: EV batteries are large and expensive. Nanom thinks it has a solution: a cheaper, longer-lasting cell that can be built right in to the structure of a vehicle.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Reviewing Google's sleep-stalking smart display
item.description: This week, Cherlynn and Devindra are joined by UK bureau chief Mat Smith to dive deeper into our review of Google’s new Nest Hub. Is the sleep-tracking smart display creepy or cool? Plus, loads of updates from Google and a peek at Xiaomi’s first foldable phone.

item.title: How and why to buy a projector
item.description: Here's a list of the best projectors you can buy at all price points, as well as tips and tricks for shopping for a projector.

item.title: The Morning After: Casio will make a G-Shock smartwatch with Wear OS
item.description: Google's wearable OS meets Casio's smartwatch, and Amazon thought about opening discount stores.

item.title: Google puts limits on which apps can see what's installed on an Android device
item.description: Google has updated its Developer Program Policy to limit the kinds of apps that can request the QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES permission, which returns the full list of installed apps on a device that runs Android 11 or later.

item.title: 'Fantasian,' from the creator of Final Fantasy, arrives on Apple Arcade
item.description: Fantasian, the new RPG that unites Final Fantasy creator Hironobu Sakaguchi with composer Nobuo Uematsu, has landed on mobile gaming service Apple Arcade.

item.title: Amazon reportedly explored opening discount stores to offload unsold electronics
item.description: Amazon has been examining the idea of opening discount stores or outlets selling unsold electronics and home goods at steep discounts.

item.title: Sony will unveil a new Xperia device on April 14th
item.description: Sony is launching a new Xperia product on April 14th at 4:30PM Japan time or 3:30AM Eastern time in the US.

item.title: E3 2021 organizers confirm the all-digital event will be '100 percent free'
item.description: E3 2021 will be '100 percent free' according to its organizers, with no paywalled content.

item.title: ILM explains how it used Stagecraft 2.0 for season two of 'The Mandalorian'
item.description: ILM made StageCraft better and easier to use.

item.title: Microsoft's cloud services are down again, possible DNS issue
item.description: Having Xbox problems? Microsoft's cloud outage could be causing sign-in problems.
